lead_paragraph: Florida State’s student government has passed a resolution discouraging Seminoles fans from wearing Native American headdresses at games.

headline.main: Florida State Discourages Native American Headdresses at Games

snippet: Florida State’s student government has passed a resolution discouraging Seminoles fans from wearing Native American headdresses at games.
abstract: Student government at Florida State votes forward nonbinding opinion that wearing Native American headdresses to sporting events should be considered violation of student code of conduct.
